titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: CDS V6-2 Type 180 - Admitted Patient Care - Unfinished Birth Episode CDS - Specification

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 001 - CDS Interchange Header

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 001 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange HeaderOne per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 003 - CDS Message Header

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 003 - Commissioning Data Set Message HeaderOne per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

body.p: One of the following options must be used:

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 005N - CDS Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

entry.p: Function: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of one of the Net Change Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol One per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 005B - CDS Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

entry.p: Function: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Bulk Replacement Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update ProtocolOne per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
To carry the details of the Patient Pathway.
DATA GROUP: REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the personal details of the Patient (the Baby).See Note: S3 in Commissioning Data Set Business Rules.
DATA GROUP: VERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used where the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODENational Code = 01 (Number present and verified)
DATA GROUP: UNVERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used for all other values of the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODENOT included in the above
DATA GROUP: WITHHELD IDENTITY STRUCTURE (Birth Episode)Must be used where the Commissioning Data Set record has been anonymised
To carry the characteristics of the Patient (the Baby).
DATA GROUP: HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL - ADMISSION CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the admission details of the Hospital Provider Spell containing the Episode.
DATA GROUP: HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL - DISCHARGE CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the discharge details of the Hospital Provider Spell containing the Episode.
DATA GROUP: CONSULTANT EPISODE - ACTIVITY CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the details of the Patient's Episode (the Baby).
DATA GROUP: CONSULTANT EPISODE- OVERSEAS VISITOR STATUS GROUP
To carry the details of the Overseas Visitor Status of the Patient during the Episode.
DATA GROUP: CONSULTANT EPISODE - SERVICE AGREEMENT DETAILS
To carry the details of the Service Agreement.
To carry the details of the Responsible Care Professional.
DATA GROUP: BIRTH EPISODE - CLINICAL DIAGNOSIS GROUP (ICD)
To carry the details of the ICD coded Clinical Diagnoses.
DATA GROUP: BIRTH EPISODE - CLINICAL DIAGNOSIS GROUP (READ)
To carry the details of the READ coded Clinical Diagnoses.
DATA GROUP: BIRTH EPISODE - CLINICAL ACTIVITY GROUP (OPCS)
To carry the details of the Intended OPCS coded Clinical Activities.
DATA GROUP: MAIN OPERATING HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL
DATA GROUP: MAIN OPERATING HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL 2
DATA GROUP: BIRTH EPISODE - CLINICAL ACTIVITY GROUP (READ)
To carry the details of the READ coded Clinical Activities.
DATA GROUP: LOCATION GROUP (AT START OF EPISODE)
To carry the details of the Location at the Start Of Episode.
DATA GROUP: LOCATION GROUP (AT WARD STAY)
To carry the details of the Location at a Ward Stay.
DATA GROUP: LOCATION GROUP (AT END OF EPISODE)
To carry the details of the Location at the End Of Episode.
DATA GROUP: BIRTH EPISODE - NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE PERIOD
See CRITICAL CARE PERIODTo carry the details of the first 9 Critical Care Periods for care provided using Neonatal Care facilities.
DATA GROUP: BIRTH EPISODE - PAEDIATRIC CRITICAL CARE PERIOD
See CRITICAL CARE PERIODTo carry the details of the first 9 Critical Care Periods for care provided using Paediatric Care facilities.
DATA GROUP: BIRTH EPISODE - ADULT CRITICAL CARE PERIOD
See CRITICAL CARE PERIODTo carry the details of the first 9 Critical Care Periods for care provided using Adult Care facilities.
To carry the Patient's General Medical Practitioner and the General Practice details.
To carry the details of the Referrer.
To carry the details of the Pregnancy.
DATA GROUP: ANTENATAL CARE - ACTIVITY CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the details of the Antenatal Care.
DATA GROUP: ANTENATAL CARE - PERSON GROUP (RESPONSIBLE CLINICIAN)
To carry the details of the General Medical Practitioner responsible for the Antenatal Care.
DATA GROUP: ANTENATAL CARE - LOCATION GROUP - DELIVERY PLACE INTENDED
To carry the details of the Intended Delivery Location.
To carry the details of the Labour/Delivery.
DATA GROUP: DELIVERY OCCURRENCE - ACTIVITY CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the details of the Delivery Occurrence.
DATA GROUP: BIRTH OCCURRENCE PERSON IDENTITY - MOTHER
To carry the Identity details of the Baby's Mother.See Note: S3 in Commissioning Data Set Business Rules.
DATA GROUP: UNVERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used for all other values of the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODE_(MOTHER)NOT included in the above
DATA GROUP: VERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used where the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODE_(MOTHER)National Code = 01 (Number present and verified)
DATA GROUP: WITHHELD IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used where the Commissioning Data Set record has been anonymised
DATA GROUP: DELIVERY OCCURRENCE - OVERSEAS VISITOR STATUS AT CDS ACTIVITY DATE GROUP
To carry the details of the Overseas Visitor Status of the Mother.
DATA GROUP: DELIVERY OCCURRENCE - LOCATION GROUP - DELIVERY PLACE ACTUAL
To carry the details of the Actual Delivery Location.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer One per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service. Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange TrailerOne per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
